alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:06AM EST until January 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall totals will be in the snow belt of Erie County, especially south of I-90 and east of I-79. The best window for snow will be this morning and light snow will persist through the afternoon and evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
